pageContext.claim: “And if the Democrats ever had the chance, the first thing they would do is get rid of it and raise up your taxes, sometimes by 40, 50, 60 percent higher than you’re paying right now. ”
pageContext.analysis: There is no evidence Democrats want to raise taxes by 40 to 60 percent. In fact, many Democrats were broadly supportive of a corporate tax cut, provided it was revenue neutral. But the GOP leadership did not seek to win over Democratic votes.
